title: The Long Night
transcript:
NORTHMAN: Oi!
NORTHMAN: Mind out.
NORTHMAN: MOVE!
NORTHMAN: Look, on the west wall!"
SOLDIER: Get down to the crypt!
SOLDIER: Just hold.
MAN: We'll take him.
LYANNA: Come on, help the lads!"
SOLDIER: Yes, my lady."
LYANNA: Quickly, now! Quickly! Get those in position."
SOLDIER: Come on.
SOLDIER: Close the gate!
SOLDIER: That's it.
EDD: Oh, for fuck's sake. You took your time."
MELISANDRE: Do you speak their tongue?
MELISANDRE: Tell them to lift their swords.
MELISANDRE: Valar morghulis.
GREY WORM: Valar dohaeris.
DAVOS: Open the gate!
SOLDIER: Open the gate!
MAN: Come. Come on. Easy.
MELISANDRE: There's no need to execute me, Ser Davos. I'll be dead before the dawn."
SOLDIER: Cease fire!
JON SNOW: The Night King is coming.
DAENERYS TARGARYEN: The dead are already here.
BRIENNE: Stand your ground!
ARYA STARK: Get down to the crypt.
SANSA STARK: I'm not abandoning my people.
ARYA STARK: Take this and go.
SANSA STARK: I don't know how to use it.
ARYA STARK: Stick them with the pointy end.
SAM TARLY: Edd! Edd!
EDD: Sam, get up!"
EDD: Oh, God. Sam."
WOMAN: Edd!
TORMUND: Fall back! Fall back!
BRIENNE: Fall back!
SOLDIER: Come on!
LYANNA: Open the gate!
SOLDIER: Let us in!
SOLDIER: Keep moving!
LYANNA: Keep moving, fast!"
SOLDIER: To your posts!
SOLDIER: Go!
SOLDIER: Come on, run! Keep moving!"
GREY WORM: Protect the retreat!
GREY WORM: Stand your ground!
JON SNOW: Dany!
SOLDIER: Grab your weapon now!
SOLDIER: Guard the barricades!
SOLDIER: Through that pass!
BRIENNE: Hey! Hey! Hey!
SOLDIER: Close up the gaps!
BRIENNE: Go! Hey! Go! Go!
JAIME LANNISTER: Get in! Get in! Get in! Come on!
SOLDIER: Move!
SOLDIER: Retreat!
LYANNA: Protect the gate!
SOLDIER: Protect the gate!
JAIME LANNISTER: They're coming! Come on!
SANDOR CLEGANE: Fall back!
GREY WORM: Light the trench! Light the trench!
SOLDIER: Wait!
SOLDIER: Light the trench!
DAVOS: She can't see us.
DAVOS: Light the trenches!
SOLDIER: With a torch, light the trenches! Right there."
SOLDIER: Torch it!
MELISANDRE: Lord of Light, cast your light upon us. Lord of Light, defend us. For the night is dark and full of terrors!"
MELISANDRE: Lord of Light, cast your light upon us! Lord of Light, defend us! For the night is dark and full of terrors!"
BERIC: Clegane.
WOMAN: You must try not to worry yourself.
VARYS: At least we're already in a crypt.
TYRION LANNISTER: If we were up there, we might see something everyone else is missing. Something that makes a difference."
TYRION LANNISTER: What? Remember the Battle of Blackwater? I brought us through the Mud Gate.
VARYS: And got your face cut in half.
TYRION LANNISTER: And it made a difference. If I was out there right now...
SANSA STARK: You'd die. There's nothing you can do.
TYRION LANNISTER: You might be surprised at the lengths I'd go to avoid joining the Army of the Dead. I could think of no organization less suited to my talents.
SANSA STARK: Witty remarks won't make a difference. That's why we're down here, none of us can do anything. It's the truth. It's the most heroic thing we can do now look the truth in the face."
TYRION LANNISTER: Maybe we should have stayed married.
SANSA STARK: You were the best of them.
TYRION LANNISTER: What a terrifying thought.
SANSA STARK: It wouldn't work between us.
TYRION LANNISTER: Why not?
SANSA STARK: The Dragon Queen. Your divided loyalties would become a problem.
MISSANDEI: Yes. Without the Dragon Queen, there'd be no problem at all. We'd all be dead already."
THEON GREYJOY: They lit the trench. Bran I just want you to know... I wish... The things I did
BRAN STARK: Everything you did brought you where you are now. Where you belong. Home.
BRAN STARK: I'm going to go now.
THEON GREYJOY: Go where?
DAVOS: Man the walls!
SOLDIER: Man the walls!
SOLDIER: Man the wall!
LYANNA: Man the walls! Come on!
LYANNA: Get out there! Get moving!
JAIME LANNISTER: Come on. Come on! Come on! Go, go, go!"
BRIENNE: Come on!
SOLDIER: They're against the wall!
SOLDIER: Get more men up here!
SOLDIER: Fill the gaps, quickly!"
JAIME LANNISTER: Get in there!
SOLDIER: They're climbing the walls!
JAIME LANNISTER: Relieve the archers!
SOLDIER: Relieve the archers!
JAIME LANNISTER: Archers on top!
SOLDIER: Move up!
SOLDIER: Go, go! Come here! Come on!"
SOLDIER: Move back!
SOLDIER: Stand away!
SOLDIER: Go on, go on."
JORAH MORMONT: Go! Go.
SOLDIER: Step back.
SOLDIER: All the way, archers!"
SOLDIER: Hold the wall!
SOLDIER: The wall, they're coming up!"
JAIME LANNISTER: Draw!
JAIME LANNISTER: Come on!
SOLDIER: They're coming up!
JAIME LANNISTER: Look out!
BERIC: Clegane! Clegane!
BERIC: Clegane! Clegane, we need you!"
BERIC: You can't give up on us.
SANDOR CLEGANE: Fuck off! We can't beat them. Don't you see that, you stupid whore? We're fighting Death! They can't beat Death."
BERIC: Tell her that.
SOLDIER: Open the door!
SOLDIER: Open the door! Open the door! Please! Open it!
SANDOR CLEGANE: Come on!
BERIC: Go!
BERIC: Run!
SANDOR CLEGANE: We've gotta go!
MELISANDRE: The Lord brought him back for a purpose. Now that purpose has been served.
ARYA STARK: I know you.
MELISANDRE: And I know you.
ARYA STARK: You said we'd meet again.
MELISANDRE: And here we are. At the end of the world.
ARYA STARK: You said I'd shut many eyes forever. You were right about that too.
MELISANDRE: Brown eyes... green eyes... and blue eyes.
MELISANDRE: What do we say to the God of Death?
ARYA STARK: Not today.
THEON GREYJOY: Here they come!
THEON GREYJOY: Steady, lads."
THEON GREYJOY: Steady now. Make every shot count.
MAN: Over there!
MAN: There!
JON SNOW: Get off!
DAENERYS TARGARYEN: Dracarys.
TYRION LANNISTER: Come on! Come on! No! No, no, no!"
JON SNOW: Bran!
DAENERYS TARGARYEN: Go!
DAENERYS TARGARYEN: Jorah!
BRAN STARK: Theon.
BRAN STARK: You're a good man.
BRAN STARK: Thank you.
JORAH MORMONT: I'm hurt.
